item.title: Report I-2024110076
item.description:
Report I-2024110076

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-28T06:19:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-20
  • City: Miami
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: AMERICAN AIRLINES AMERICAN EAGLE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Outbound flight AA1646 MIA-DFW at Gate D8 had a shipment that was refused due to a DG-related issue. CC called to report that they had a DGD at the gate, but there was no NOTOC. I instructed CC to refuse the cargo and ensure the shipment is not loaded. I sent Tim to the gate, and he confirmed that, in addition to the freight containing batteries, one of the pieces was labeled for cargo aircraft only. This is an undeclared DGD from the shipper, if you noticed in these photos, the ramp broke down the skid which contained the hidden Dangerous Good
